overview: The Mysterious Mr Wizdom is a clever Love Comedy about a retired cantankerous military vet named Mr. Wizdom who has a dark secret. His son Wizdom Jr along with his partner Queen and her daughter Beauty embark on an artistic life journey of Love, Romance, Pain and Mystery. Mr. Wizdom is based in the suburbs of Chicago IL. with an all black cast and crew based out of Chicago. This is a fictional story written, directed and produced by Andre Blaze' Rodgers.
title: The Mysterious Mr. Wizdom
